<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">

        <number>SNSCRIPT0001077</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>createNewTask ();

function createNewTask () {
   var pro_tsk = new GlideRecord('u_procurement_task');
   pro_tsk.assigned_to = current.u_requested_for; 
   pro_tsk.short_description = 'Please review the new attached resume';
   pro_tsk.parent = current.sys_id;
   var sysID = pro_tsk.insert();
   
   current.u_documentation_uploaded = false;

}
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type/>
        <short_description>Creating Tasks in a loop from a Script and making them Children to the Parent</short_description>
